text: Ra yasai prakara allahale timila'i visesa rupama rojnecha, ra sapanako arthako jnana gara'unecha, ra juna kisimale usale aphno varadana aghi timro baje–baraju, ibrahima tatha ‘‘is'haka’’ la'i pradana gareko thiyo, tyasai prakarale timimathi ra ya'akubako santatila'i pani pradana garnecha. Nihsandeha timro palanakarta (sarva) jnata ra tatvadarsi cha
